sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他对决定有疑问，但他还是选择服从
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他對決定有疑問，但他還是選擇服從
sentences.pinyin: jǐnguǎn tā duì juédìng yǒu yíwèn, dàn tā háishì xuǎnzé fúcóng
sentences.translation: Although he had doubts about the decision, he chose to obey

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他对这个决定有所保留，但他仍然选择服从。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他對這個決定有所保留，但他仍然選擇服從。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tā duì zhège juédìng yǒu suǒ bǎoliú, dàn tā réngrán xuǎnzé fúcóng.
sentences.translation: Despite his reservations about the decision, he still chose to obey.
